hero-text: With over 15 years of experience in HR, Reference Agency specializes in technology hiring, HR consultancy, and outsourcing services. We partner with ambitious businesses across Egypt, KSA, UAE—and soon the entire MENA region—to solve their most critical HR challenges and elevate workforce performance. We’re not just recruiters.
